body:
I'm trying to debug a build problem. I'm looking at the log file, which begins by listing the `configure` command. It's difficult to see exactly what options were given because these options contain spaces. Adding quotes to this log output would be better.

For example, instead of outputting

```
./configure --with-flags=a b c
```

I'd like to see

```
./configure --with-flags='a b c'
```
title: Log output for how configure is called should use quotes
